articles.title: Soccer-Brazil v Argentina match officials suspended for 'serious errors'
articles.description:
The referee and the Video Assistant Referee (VAR) who officiated in Tuesday's World Cup qualifier between Brazil and Argentina have been suspended for "serious errors", the South American soccer governing body CONMEBOL said.
The 0-0 draw allowed Argentina to join Brazil in sealing qualification for the World Cup in Qatar next year.

articles.title: 'The win against the All Blacks was extra special but we’ve turned the page quickly' - James Ryan
articles.description: It’s less than four years since James Ryan made his first start for Ireland against Argentina in the final game of a successful November window.
articles.content:

articles.title: Farmers in Argentina have sold 34.1 million tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 34.1 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report that included data updated through Nov. 10.The rhythm of sales was behind that of the previous season.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 34.1 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report that included data updated through Nov. 10.

articles.title: CONMEBOL suspends officials over missed elbow assault
articles.description: South American football's governing authorities on Wednesday suspended two Uruguayan referees for missing a blatant elbow strike during the Argentina-Brazil clash the night before in a World Cup qualifier.
